Invocation Name: smarter german
des:
This skill is an enhancement for the Preaching technique that you will learn in the smarterGerman online course.

In order to become fluent in German one needs to practice. But mere repetitive and mind-numbing practice could actually harm your motivation. To speak better German quickly one needs controlled and intelligent speaking practice.

In the smarterGerman online German course you’ll get to know a very powerful technique which helps you not only memorize complex grammatical structures in a refreshingly easy way but also recall the information when you need it most. 

You’ll build up muscle memory by speaking out loud so that later on, when you finally get to use your German in real life, you won’t stumble over your own tongue that much but actually sound fluent.

This skill is the speaking partner you have been looking for since you started to get a grasp of the awful German language - thanks Mark Twain. Alexa is 100% patient, incredibly precise in her feedback and 24/7 at your disposal.

All you need is an Amazon Echo device which costs less than a single lesson with a professional German tutor. Just that you do get unlimited lessons with Alexa. 

Please keep in mind that the Preaching technique is only one of many powerful self-learning techniques which you can find in my Everyday German Online Course (A1-B1).

For available commands in German, switch to German locale.
